title: Supreme Pizza Crescent Ring
directions: Heat oven to 350°F. Line large cookie sheet with cooking parchment paper or silicone nonstick baking mat.

Separate 2 cans (8 oz each) Pillsbury™ refrigerated crescent dinner rolls into 4 rectangles from each can, making 8 total rectangles. Arrange dough rectangles on cookie sheet in star pattern, overlapping each other while leaving an open circle in center.

Spread 1 cup Muir Glen™ organic pizza sauce in ring close to center of dough. Top sauce with 2 cups shredded mozzarella cheese, 1/2 cup pepperoni slices, 3 slices ham, chopped, 1/2 green bell pepper, chopped, and 1/4 cup sliced ripe olives.
Bring dough up over filling, tucking it underneath to fully enclose filling.
Bake 25 to 30 minutes or until golden brown and thoroughly baked. Cool 5 minutes before slicing and serving.
You may need to top the pizza ring with a sheet of foil during the last few minutes of baking to prevent the top from getting too brown.
Serve slices of pizza with extra pizza sauce for dunking!
No nutrition information available for this recipe
ingredients: cans (8 oz each) Pillsbury™ refrigerated crescent dinner rolls
cup Muir Glen™ organic pizza sauce (from 15-oz can)
